DateTime.description: String @format date-time, as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example: 2014-05-22T10:42:42.542+00:00.

mailpieceId.description: The mailpieceId represents the machine specific identifier to track a mail item during a machine sorting cycle. The identifier is used to synchronize the data events between coding and sorting systems.

idTags.description: An array of idTags. The list can be null or empty if no identification tag was found.

description: This type contains the coding result for a mail piece that has been determined by CS (ORCA).
